item.title: About
item.description: Sources, References and Examples Sources are specified: [src] - Sources: Link to where a information or thought is coming from. [ref] - References: Link to a supporting or further informations. [eg] - Example: Link to an example of a information. This website contains links to external sites that are not operated by me. I am not responsible for content, privacy policies and/or practices of any third-party websites. Visiting external links is at your own discretion and risk.

item.title: Copyright
item.description: Content Text from Blogposts The blogposts are licences under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 This does not include other pages (e.g. the Homepage, About etc.) Images Original Images made by me are licenced under the same terms as text. Non-original images are licences under the terms of the corresponding licensor. Commercial Use As the CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 standard is non-exclusive, licences for commercial use can be made. (Kindly note that exclusive licences are not possible as the content is already licenced CC BY-NC-SA)
